All Classes

Class Description
Block
class of Block In basic form the block is undestructible
Bomb
Class of item Bomb
Bonus
class of game item Bonus Bonus is hidden under the destructible block Bonuses should be stack on one place
Client
Class for client connection sending information to server deserialize data from server
CollisionController
General collision controller Used for collision with enemy Used for collision with explosion Used for collision with game items
Controller
Class for starting the game and controll menu screen
DestructibleBlock
class of DestructibleBlock Extends from Block it is destructible by bomb it could have more than one life
Dummy
class of game Enemy Dummy basic enemy use directional vectors for moving first direction vector is chosen randomdomly dummy could move onlz horizontal or vertical
EndGameFXMLController
Endgame screen after player death
Enemy
class of basic game Enemy basic enemy use directional vectors for moving first direction vector is chosen randomdomly another moves is always picked randomly
Game
Game class Controller of game Computed, stores and directs all game actions
Gate
Class of Gate Finding this gate allows win the game
Gfx
enum with images
Key
class of geme item Key key necessary for open the gate and winning the game
Map
class of game Map Used for calculation of size of game window Used for saving parameters about number of enemies Game Hashmap of coordinates is generated by this class
MapSetter
Method for setting game after their starts sets player on start position, set enemies, set blocks by configuration map contains method and parameters for restarting plazers
MultiplayerGameServer
mulitplaer game class prepared for online game Controller of game Computed, stores and directs all game actions
OptionFXMLController
Options screen after press ESCAPE
ParentEnum
enum for fxmlPages
PauseGameFXMLController
Pause screen after press ESCAPE
Player
class of game hero
Server
Class for creating connection serialize data send data
ServerFXMLController
Multiplayer menu screen
SingleGameFXMLController
Single player menu
Speedy
class of speedy game Enemy basic enemy use directional vectors for moving first direction vector is chosen randomdomly another moves is always picked randomly speedy is 2 times faster than others
View
General view contains all veiw methods generate map by configurated parameters redraw by everz frame by game Coordinates
ViewHelper
View helper for multiplayer game based on general view prepared for plannin network game contains all veiw methods generate map by configurated parameters redraw by everz frame by game Coordinates
WinGameFXMLController
Endgame screen after win game
